item.description:
Blues Cafe
Come eat, drink, and dance at Blues Cafe!
Friday Sept. 21st
Beginner lesson 8-9
Live music by
SOLOMON DOUGLAS TRIO
till 12:30am
98 George P. Hassett Dr., Medford Sq.
Just off Rt. 93 next to Hyatt Place
Directions at www.springstep.org

STUDENTS AND SENIORS - ONLY $8 ADMISSION

Don't like to dance? Come hang out and enjoy the beautiful atmosphere, drink free coffee and bottled water, enjoy snacks and homemade cookies while the band seranades you and dancers entertain you!

No partner or experience in dancing required! This is a relaxed and friendly event with fun people and a positive vibe.

Questions? Call Liz anytime - 617-216-6656. Or email her at dancewithliz@gmail.com.

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: Blues Cafe and Dance - Swing, Blues, West Coast, More!
